manifest.name: snyk-resolve-deps
manifest.description: Resolves a node package tree with combined support for both npm@2 and npm@3.

scripts.test: npm run check-tests && npm run lint && tap test/*.test.[jt]s --timeout=60 --node-arg=-r --node-arg=ts-node/register
